rows.label: tev001393_MSG0001
rows.name:
Good day to you, [ST:playername ].
Are you doing some shopping?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0002
rows.name:
Rock and I had some time off, so we decided to
explore the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0003
rows.name: Are there any shops here that you would recommend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0004
rows.name: Ones that do not sell food, preferably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0005
rows.name:
Rock has quite an appetite, so it makes more sense
for us to prepare food at home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Boutiques

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0011
rows.name: Recommend visiting a boutique.

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest L's

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0021
rows.name: Recommend they visit L's shop.

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Toys

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0031
rows.name: Recommend they pop into the toy store.

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0006
rows.name: You humans certainly do enjoy dressing up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0007
rows.name:
It is rather fun just to look through the windows at all
the beautiful clothes your boutiques sell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0008
rows.name: I would very much like to try them on one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0040
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Celica that you're sure she'd
look wonderful in them.

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0050
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0051
rows.name: Worry that they won't have matching clothes for Rock.

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0009
rows.name: Do you really think so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0010
rows.name: It would be wonderful if they had something that fit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0011
rows.name: But I'd be afraid to enter a shop like that by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0012
rows.name:
Rock certainly couldn't come with me,
and I wouldn't know what to do by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0013
rows.name: Hmm... Oh! Perhaps I could invite Lin to join me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0014
rows.name:
Of course, it would be all the more fun if you were to
come as well, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0015
rows.name: Dear me, that's hardly a concern![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0016
rows.name:
If I was to dress as Rock does, I'd be clad in nothing
but a cloak! That would be quite embarrassing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0017
rows.name: It's going into a boutique alone that worries me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0018
rows.name:
Rock certainly couldn't come with me,
and I wouldn't know what to do by myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0019
rows.name: Hmm... Oh! Perhaps I could invite Lin to join me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0020
rows.name:
Of course, it would be all the more fun if you were to
come as well, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0021
rows.name: I've actually visited his shop a number of times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0022
rows.name:
He's a delightfully odd creature, and his shop has so
many interesting things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0023
rows.name:
I was surprised to see a peeler that only worked on
starlight apples. He said it cannot peel potatoes or
carrots or anything else. Only starlight apples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0024
rows.name:
Of course, there's little call for such a specific item.
Poor L said he hadn't sold a single one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0025
rows.name:
There were all sorts of other strange things, too,
like rock-orange detectors and vagabond-ant
observation diaries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0026
rows.name:
I look forward to speaking with L again once he
obtains some new stock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0027
rows.name:
That sounds like fun. I don't think I've ever seen any
human toys before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0028
rows.name:
But there aren't any children here in New LA, are there?
So I suppose these toys must be intended for adults.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0029
rows.name: Or perhaps they're for Nopon and Ma-non customers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0030
rows.name: Well, I'm quite curious to find out for myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0031
rows.name:
I do hope there will be something that Rock and I can
enjoy together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0032
rows.name: We shall go pay this toy shop a visit right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0033
rows.name: Could you point us in the right direction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0060
rows.name: Say "North Founders Street"

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0061
rows.name: Direct Celica to North Founders Street.

rows.label: tev001393_JNK0070
rows.name: Say "Melville Street"

rows.label: tev001393_SEL0071
rows.name: Direct Celica to Melville Street.

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0034
rows.name:
North Founders Street? I understand.
Thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001393_MSG0035
rows.name: Melville Street? I understand. Thank you so much![ST:wait ]
